snippet: Emmanuel Morantus worked three jobs to support his family as an immigrant nearly 30 years ago, but now his failing health keeps him tied to an oxygen tank and to electricity bills he cannot afford.
abstract: Metropolitan Council on Jewish Poverty assists Emmanuel Morantus pay the rent and helps with utilities for his apartment in Canarsie, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: Emmanuel Morantus worked three jobs to support his family as an immigrant nearly 30 years ago, but now his failing health keeps him tied to an oxygen tank and to electricity bills he cannot afford.

headline.seo: A Retiree on Oxygen Trying to Pay His Power Bills
headline.main: Retired, Needing Oxygen and Trying to Pay His Bills
headline.print_headline: Retired, Needing Oxygen, And Trying to Pay His Bills
